interpretation: The Shield card represents protection and defense. It indicates that you may need to create boundaries or safeguard yourself from negative influences or harmful situations. It can also symbolize a need for security and safety in your personal or professional life. You have the strength and ability to protect yourself from harm and navigate difficult situations. The Shield card reminds you to trust in your own power and to take steps to protect what is important to you. It may also indicate a need to be cautious or to seek the advice of others who have experience in navigating similar situations. Overall, the Shield card suggests that you have the power to protect yourself and to overcome obstacles with strength and perseverance.
